entry.name: Onkyo EISCP
entry.description: LAN Control for Onkyo Devices using EISCP
LAN Steuerung für Onkyo Geräte mittels EISCP
entry.author: Carsten Thielepape

action.name: init
action.desc: Returns an XML description of the device configuration

action.name: main.speaker-layout.front-high
action.desc: sets Front High Speaker / SurrBack+Front High Speakers

action.name: main.speaker-layout.front-wide
action.desc: sets Front Wide Speaker / SurrBack+Front Wide Speakers

action.name: main.master-volume.hex
action.desc: Volume Level 0 to 100 or 0 to 80 (device dependent) ( In hexadecimal representation)

action.name: main.tone-front-wide.bass-up
action.desc: sets Front Wide Bass up(2 step)

action.name: main.tone-front-wide.bass-down
action.desc: sets Front Wide Bass down(2 step)

action.name: main.tone-front-wide.treble-up
action.desc: sets Front Wide Treble up(2 step)

action.name: main.tone-front-wide.treble-down
action.desc: sets Front Wide Treble down(2 step)

action.name: main.tone-front-high.bass-up
action.desc: sets Front High Bass up(2 step)

action.name: main.tone-front-high.bass-down
action.desc: sets Front High Bass down(2 step)

action.name: main.tone-front-high.treble-up
action.desc: sets Front High Treble up(2 step)

action.name: main.tone-front-high.treble-down
action.desc: sets Front High Treble down(2 step)

action.name: main.tone-surround-back.bass-up
action.desc: sets Surround Back Bass up(2 step)

action.name: main.tone-surround-back.bass-down
action.desc: sets Surround Back Bass down(2 step)

action.name: main.tone-surround-back.treble-up
action.desc: sets Surround Back Treble up(2 step)

action.name: main.tone-surround-back.treble-down
action.desc: sets Surround Back Treble down(2 step)

action.name: main.sleep-set.time
action.desc: sets Sleep Time 1 - 90min ( In hexadecimal representation) 01 to 5A

action.name: main.display-mode.selector-listening
action.desc: sets Selector + Listening Mode Display Mode

action.name: main.dimmer-level.bright-led-off
action.desc: sets Dimmer Level Bright and LED OFF

action.name: main.hdmi-output-selector.up
action.desc: sets HDMI Out Selector Wrap-Around Up

action.name: main.hdmi-audio-out.up
action.desc: sets HDMI Audio Out Wrap-Around Up

action.name: main.monitor-out-resolution.up
action.desc: sets Monitor Out Resolution Wrap-Around Up

action.name: main.isf-mode.up
action.desc: sets ISF Mode State Wrap-Around Up

action.name: main.video-wide-mode.up
action.desc: sets Video Zoom Mode Wrap-Around Up

action.name: main.video-picture-mode.up
action.desc: sets Video Zoom Mode Wrap-Around Up

action.name: main.listening-mode.thx-games
action.desc: sets THX Games Mode,THX U2/S2/I/S Games

action.name: main.listening-mode.neo-6-cinema-dts-surround-sensation
action.desc: sets Neo:6 Cinema DTS Surround Sensation

action.name: main.listening-mode.neo-6-music-dts-surround-sensation
action.desc: sets Neo:6 Music DTS Surround Sensation

action.name: main.listening-mode.pliiz-height-thx-u2
action.desc: sets PLIIz Height + THX U2/S2 Cinema

action.name: main.listening-mode.pliiz-height-thx-u2
action.desc: sets PLIIz Height + THX U2/S2 Music

action.name: main.listening-mode.pliiz-height-thx-u2
action.desc: sets PLIIz Height + THX U2/S2 Games

action.name: main.listening-mode.neural-digital-music-audyssey-dsx
action.desc: sets Neural Digital Music + Audyssey DSX

action.name: main.late-night.up
action.desc: sets Late Night State Wrap-Around Up

action.name: main.cinema-filter.up
action.desc: sets Cinema Filter State Wrap-Around Up

action.name: main.audyssey-2eq-multeq-multeq-xt.up
action.desc: sets Audyssey 2EQ/MultEQ/MultEQ XT State Wrap-Around Up

action.name: main.audyssey-dynamic-eq.up
action.desc: sets Audyssey Dynamic EQ State Wrap-Around Up

action.name: main.audyssey-dynamic-eq.query
action.desc: gets The Audyssey Dynamic EQ State

action.name: main.audyssey-dynamic-volume.up
action.desc: sets Audyssey Dynamic Volume State Wrap-Around Up

action.name: main.audyssey-dynamic-volume.query
action.desc: gets The Audyssey Dynamic Volume State

action.name: main.dolby-volume.up
action.desc: sets Dolby Volume State Wrap-Around Up

action.name: main.music-optimizer.up
action.desc: sets Music Optimizer State Wrap-Around Up

action.name: main.tuning
action.desc: sets Directly Tuning Frequency (FM nnn.nn MHz / AM nnnnn kHz / SR nnnnn ch) put 0 in the first two digits of nnnnn at SR

action.name: main.preset.no
action.desc: sets Preset No. 1 - 40 (to 30 on some devices) ( In hexadecimal representation)

action.name: main.preset-memory.no
action.desc: sets Preset No. 1 - 40 (to 30 on some devices) ( In hexadecimal representation)

action.name: main.pty-scan.no
action.desc: sets PTY No 0 - 30 ( In hexadecimal representation)

action.name: main.tp-scan
action.desc: Start TP Scan (When Dont Have Parameter)

action.name: main.sirius-parental-lock.input
action.desc: displays Please input the Lock password

action.name: main.sirius-parental-lock.wrong
action.desc: displays The Lock password is wrong

action.name: main.hd-radio-channel-program.directly
action.desc: sets directly HD Radio Channel Program (1 to 8)

action.name: main.hd-radio-blend-mode.auto
action.desc: sets HD Radio Blend Mode Auto

action.name: main.hd-radio-blend-mode.analog
action.desc: sets HD Radio Blend Mode Analog

action.name: main.hd-radio-blend-mode.query
action.desc: gets the HD Radio Blend Mode Status

action.name: main.hd-radio-tuner-status.mmnnoo
action.desc: mmnnoo HD Radio Tuner Status (3 bytes) mm -> 00 not HD, 01 HD nn -> current Program 01-08 oo -> receivable Program (8 bits are represented in hexadecimal notation. Each bit shows receivable or not.)

action.name: main.hd-radio-tuner-status.query
action.desc: gets the HD Radio Tuner Status

action.name: main.net-usb-time-info.mm-ss-mm-ss
action.desc: NET/USB Time Info (Elapsed time/Track Time Max 99:59) mm:ss/mm:ss

action.name: main.net-usb-play-status.prs
action.desc: NET/USB Play Status (3 letters) p -> Play Status: S: STOP, P: Play, p: Pause, F: FF, R: FR r -> Repeat Status: -: Off, R: All, F: Folder, 1: Repeat 1, s -> Shuffle Status: -: Off, S: All , A: Album, F: Folder

action.name: main.internet-radio-preset
action.desc: sets Preset No. 1 - 40 ( In hexadecimal representation)

action.name: main.net-service
action.desc: select Network Service directly ss -> Network Serveice i-> Acount Info 0: No 1: Yes aaaa...aaaa bbbb...bbbb Password ( 128 Unicode letters [UTF-8 encoded] max )

action.name: main.ipod-artist-name-info
action.desc: iPod Artist Name (variable-length, 64 letters max ASCII letter only)

action.name: main.ipod-album-name-info
action.desc: iPod Album Name (variable-length, 64 letters max ASCII letter only)

action.name: main.ipod-title-name
action.desc: iPod Title Name (variable-length, 64 letters max ASCII letter only)

action.name: main.ipod-time-info
action.desc: iPod Time Info (Elapsed time/Track Time Max 99:59) mm:ss/mm:ss

action.name: main.ipod-track-info
action.desc: iPod Track Info (Current Track/Toral Track Max 9999)

action.name: main.tuning
action.desc: sets Directly Tuning Frequency (FM nnn.nn MHz / AM nnnnn kHz)

action.name: main.dab-preset.no-1-40
action.desc: sets Preset No. 1 - 40 ( In hexadecimal representation)

action.name: main.preset-memory
action.desc: Memory Preset No. 1 - 40 ( In hexadecimal representation)

action.name: main.hd-radio-channel-program.directly
action.desc: sets directly HD Radio Channel Program

action.name: main.hd-radio-blend-mode.auto
action.desc: sets HD Radio Blend Mode Auto

action.name: main.hd-radio-blend-mode.analog
action.desc: sets HD Radio Blend Mode Analog

action.name: main.hd-radio-blend-mode.query
action.desc: gets the HD Radio Blend Mode Status

action.name: main.hd-radio-artist-name-info
action.desc: HD Radio Artist Name (variable-length, 64 letters max)

action.name: main.hd-radio-tuner-status.query
action.desc: gets the HD Radio Tuner Status

action.name: main.dab-display-info.DAB_Bitrate_Audio Type
action.desc: DAB Bitrate and Audio Type (m:Bitrate xxxkbps,n:Audio Type Stereo/Mono)

action.name: main.dab-display-info.DAB_Multiplex_Band_ID
action.desc: DAB Multiplex Band ID(mmm) and Freq(nnnn.nnMHz) Info

action.name: main.dab-display-info.pt
action.desc: gets and display DAB Program Info

action.name: main.dab-display-info.at
action.desc: gets and display DAB Bitrate and Audio Type

action.name: main.dab-display-info.mn
action.desc: gets and display DAB Multicast Name

action.name: main.dab-display-info.mf
action.desc: gets and display DAB Multicast Band and Freq Info

action.name: main.dab-display-info.up
action.desc: gets and dispaly DAB Infomation Wrap-Around Up
